metadata.synopsis: One of the memories available in the Colony "Brain Reader" depicts a kidnapped thrall who knows MF's are in their head.  This is one of the brain jars that can be found in the tutorial area of the game.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe MemLib_AllJars" to get all the brain jars and teleport to the Brain Reading Device.- In front of you will be a severed head and a receptacle to its left. Insert the appropriate brain jar into the receptacle by interacting with it - the jar is called "Slave Mind".- After inserting the jar, it will appear on top of the receptacle and you can talk to the severed head for the dialogue to start.- This jar is one of the two jars that can be found in the tutorial level (Nautiloid).

2.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
2.text: They're in my head - THEY'RE IN MY HEAD.

1.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
1.text: They're... in yours too. It won't be long now. Until we're changed.

0.speaker: Slack-Skinned Head
0.text: Am I dead? I don't want to die. But I don't want to live. Not like this.
